articles.title: L&T secures (Significant*) order for Perdaman's Urea Plant in Australia - L&T
articles.description: Mumbai, August 21, 2023: The Saipem & Clough JV (SCJV), Australia has awarded a contract for fabrication and supply of process and piperack modules for a 2.3 MMTPA urea plant for Perdaman Chemicals and Fertilisers Pty Ltd to L&T Energy Hydrocarbon.
articles.content:
• SCJV has awarded supply and fabrication of modules on L&T Energy Hydrocarbon and Heavy Equipment on L&T Heavy Engineering.
